title: Football Friday Week 8: Overtime

One of the big ones will be going down right on the Summers Co Fayette Co border. As Meadow Bridge makes the short trip to Hinton to take on the Bobcats. This will be a matchup of two teams both rated in the top 16 in their class. Meadow Bridge is 14th in single A, and Summers Co is 9 in double A. More >> Nevada memo: DraftKings described self as gambling Daily fantasy sports sites have been dealt a setback with Nevada regulators ordering them out of the state unless they get a gambling license - a decision that's likely to be closely watched by other states... More >> Nevada says daily fantasy sports sites like DraftKings and FanDuel are gambling and are using the company's own words as evidence. More >> Concord hits the road once again Athens, WVWVVA-TVThe college football season has been a roller coaster so far for Concord. The Mountain Lions have been perfect so far at Callaghan Stadium, but the road has been a different story.Concord is just 1-2 away from Athens so far. Both of the loses came during close games against West Liberty and Charleston that they could've pulled out in the end. The Mountain Lions need this game at Notre Dame in a big way because they have conference leader Shepherd comi... Cardinals think so White Sulphur Springs, WVWVVA-TVTo the NFL now where the Arizona Cardinals continued workouts at the Greenbrier resort today. The team has been loving their stay in southern West Virginia, but there is one catch. Some of the players heard that the hotel might be inhabited by ghosts. Some are taking it well, other are traveling in packs so they don't get scared, and others are completely freaked out. Which has been pretty entertaining to the rest. "No ... Freeney played last year for San Diego but was a free agent until recently. He is 5th among active players with 111 and a half sacks. Freeney can be a big presence for this team, and he just wants to help anyway he can. "It depends honestly and its as far as I can go. I let the coaches decide where they want my and how many plays. More >> Riddick taking advantage of his time in Arizona White Sulphur Springs, WVWVVA-TVThe Arizona Cardinals held their first practice at the Greenbrier resort today. It was the first chance for some on the roster to experience the mountain state for the first time, but for one player in particular it was a homecoming.Rookie linebacker Shaq Riddick made his way back for their first time in over year. Riddick played at West Virginia for a year after transferring from Gardner Webb. Riddick was taken in the 5th round in this past ...
